column5: We have two charming log cabins for rent on the property in the Texas Hill country, just 6 miles from Bandera, Texas. Both cabins are a short walk from our Backyard Bistro and Antique Shops. Explore the wonderful herb and butterfly gardens, antique roses and native plants that attract a variety of birds and butterflies. Deer will bed down at your back door. Our cabins provide all the comforts of home.
